turns.ai_line: Good morning doctor, I don dey feel this pain for my belle after I chop some leftover rice wey don stay. I just dey feel like say I wan vomit and I dey purge too. This kind thing no dey normal for my body at all.
turns.user_input: Wow, that sounds terrible. What did you eat?

turns.ai_line: Doctor, e get any kind medicine wey I fit take for this kind pain? I no fit just dey like this oo, I get plenty work wey I suppose do.
turns.user_input: Wow, let's get you fixed up

turns.ai_line: Doctor, abeg no vex. Na urgent matter e be. Na so so pain I de dey feel for my belle. E dey come like say I wan purge but e no dey come out. You sure say no be poison dey my body?
